documentation.text: onstructor inherits VRFConsumerBase. Addresses are listed above

!UPDATE
LINK TEMPLATE FUNCTION to get price data
eturns latest ETH/USD price from Chainlink oracles.
.lateestRoundData() comes from the AggregatorV3Interface.sol import

!UPDATE

thUsd - latest price from Chainlink oracles (ETH in USD * 10**8).
eiUsd - USD in Wei, received by dividing:
         ETH in Wei (converted to compatibility with etUsd (10**18 * 10**8)),
         by ethUsd.

aking bets function.
y winning, user 2x his betAmount.
hances to win and lose are the same.

sed by game()
